thread.title: Judge upholds defamation suit, rejects Cosby's right to lie in defense of sex allegations
thread.title_full: Judge upholds defamation suit, rejects Cosby's right to lie in defense of sex allegations

title: Judge upholds defamation suit, rejects Cosby's right to lie in defense of sex allegations
text:
Published By: Cleveland.com: People - Today 
The decision delivers a legal blow to the comedian as he attempts to defend himself against accusations of sexual assault by dozens of women...
